content.raw:
I think you should be able to override it in an individual labscript file (although that might affect subsequent compilations of another labscript file...in which case runmanager should be fixed so that it resets those config flags as it does for the compiler flags)

One final change: line 1626 should be `elif not config.suppress_mild_warnings and not config.suppress_all_warnings`
content.html:
I think you should be able to override it in an individual labscript file (although that might affect subsequent compilations of another labscript file...in which case runmanager should be fixed so that it resets those config flags as it does for the compiler flags)

One final change: line 1626 should be elif not config.suppress_mild_warnings and not config.suppress_all_warnings
